name: KonSol
short_description:
"Konsol" 3.0 is a 3D AutoCAD software which supports architectural designs covering from 3D modeling to technical plan-drawing for buildings.

As the software oriented towards BIM used on a worldwide scale in architectural design and construction area, it estimates a building on a spatial, functional and elemental basis, designs its 3D architectural model in the way of assembling architectural elements such as walls, windows, door, columns, beams and slabs, and then automatically generates technical plans for ground, sectional and elevational views, thus shortening design time and increasing the precision of plans.
It is a COM-based program to customize the way the user wants. It helps users to customize parameters of archictural elements – parameters for processes such as structure, electric & heating design, estimation, and construction plan – and to insert plugins (Add-Ins) in programming languages like VB.
summary: Integrated Architectural Design Program! Intend for BIM!
